entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot generate compiled model with an enum using RC1 #31821
  • DetectChanges slow in long term contexts #31819
  • EF not generating SQL query correctly on fields that have conversion #31817

Closed

  • Unexpected ForeignKey despite being explicitly ignored in Convention-Based Model Configuration #31615
  • The issue of SQL statements following Sum after Groupby on EF6.0.5 #31733
  • Model Building: Reset precision for inherited model properties #31718
  • the function of Self join / Self referencing urgently needs to be easy to use in 8.0. #31645
  • Ability to use application logging subsystem #31613
  • Calling Select.Distinct inside of a Select causes duplicate parent entries if a value is null #31611
  • Incorrect version of dotnet ef tools - why so difficult to upgrade? #31596
  • Entity type configuration can run more than once, causing problems with seed data #31574
  • EntityFramework tools stop working after updating to VS 17.7 #31551
  • Linq Ef Core query doesn't include filter parameter for join table if not set in the same () parentheses #31536
  • EFCore Multiple Inserts - Json Column Null on Object with Same Properties #31529
  • It work for me #31484
  • Deadlocked transaction didn't rollback #31478
  • How to define global query filter expression using multi tenancy/non entity values in IEntityTypeConfiguration implementations? #31459
  • Error Updating a Json Column in an Entity not Tracked #31438
  • Please give me example how replace IModificationCommand to my implementation in MyDbContext #31434
  • Navigation Property that uses a foreign key from a different table for a middle table. #31410
  • Problem faced with transactions with EF6 for .net core 6 but was working fine in EF6 for .net framework #31112
  • No backing field could be found for property ... and the property does not have a setter #31740
    8.0.0
  • Change Tracker doesn't register updates in inner complex properties #31818
  • Custom key types with value converters throw in the compiled model #31770
    8.0.0
  • Unable to configure a nested complex type property #31726
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Store sentinel values as provider values in the compiled model #31810
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31811
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Don't throw for collection skip navigation without a setter #31796
  • Discover ComplexTypeAttribute on nested complex types #31808

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
